dares: Text a family member a random emoji without any explanation.
Tell the group about your weirdest dream.
Change your profile picture to a meme for the next hour.
Join a voice channel and sing a snippet of your favorite song.
Share a screenshot of your most-used emojis.
Post a funny GIF in the general chat.
Send a random internet fact to the group.
Change your Discord nickname to a famous movie character for the day.
Write a short poem about the last thing you ate and share it.
Use only emojis to describe your day so far.
Share a screenshot of your most frequently played game.
Compliment the person who joined the server right before you.
Share a link to a YouTube video that always makes you laugh.
Change your status to a funny one-liner for the next hour.
Pick a random word from a book and create a sentence using it.
Post a selfie of your current expression.
Describe your favorite movie in exactly five words.
Share a fun internet quiz for everyone to take.
Record a 20-second voice clip of you describing your favorite place.
Find a funny meme and create your own caption for it.
Share a screenshot of the last meme you saved.
